mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAE_COUPON(COUPON_BNO, COUPON_ID, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_TERM_START, COUPON_TERM_END, COUPON_TERM_NOW, COUPON_PRICE, COUPON_PERCENT, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_PRODUCT, COUPON_CONTENT, COUPON_USE) VALUES( #{bno}, #{id}, #{name}, #{termStart}, #{termEnd}, #{termNow}, #{price}, #{percent}, #{type}, #{product}, #{content}, #{use})
mapper.update: UPDATE SAE_COUPON SET "사용완료" FROM SAE_COUPON WHERE COUPON_BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_BNO AS bno, COUPON_ID AS id, COUPON_NAME AS name, COUPON_TERM_START AS termStart, COUPON_TERM_END AS termEnd, COUPON_TERM_NOW AS termNow, COUPON_PRICE AS price, COUPON_PERCENT AS percent, COUPON_TYPE AS type, COUPON_PRODUCT AS product, COUPON_CONTENT AS content, COUPON_USE AS use FROM SAE_COUPON WHERE COUPON_BNO = #{bno}
